content:
Welcome every obstacle and thrive on the journey to brilliance

Welcome every obstacle and thrive on the journey to brilliance

Book Demo
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?

“Whenever we talk with TecAce, they come back with ideas we didn’t even think of. They dig deeper into the problem and somehow make things better than we expected.”

“They don’t just wait for direction — they take initiative. It feels like they’re part of our team, not just a vendor we hired.”

“We’ve worked with a few app developers, but TecAce was the one we could really count on. They kept things clear, on time, and made the whole process easy for us.”

From Code to Intelligence . From Devices to Ecosystems

From Code to Intelligence . From Devices to Ecosystems

Born in the early 2000s building embedded OS for Microsoft, we scaled through a Samsung partnership to reach millions. Today, TecAce operates at the nexus of AI, cloud, and connected devices—turning products into intelligent ecosystems across industries.

From hardware to AI, we deliver optimized, end-to-end solutions — from device to cloud.

Seamless experiences across IoT, mobile, PC, and smart devices.

Global-scale operation and infrastructure management for modern enterprises.

COMPREHENSIVE SOLUTIONS TAILORED TO YOUR NEEDS

COMPREHENSIVE SOLUTIONS TAILORED TO YOUR NEEDS

From Bellevue to Seoul, From Cloud to Edge. The next decade of technology will be defined by the convergence of AI, Cloud, and Devices — and TecAce is building the infrastructure that connects them. We envision a world where intelligence runs seamlessly across platforms: from on-device AI at the edge to scalable cloud ecosystems that power enterprises worldwide.

Contact Us

content:
After more than 2 decades of digital innovation, we’re still excited about tomorrow

After more than 2 decades of digital innovation, we’re still excited about tomorrow

At TecAce, we’re a big family. We are researchers, planners, developers, and designers. Diversity, community, excellence, and vision have been our touchstones from the moment that the company was established. We draw on a deep pool of human resources to shape a dynamic culture. Our goals of professional excellence, technical achievement, mutual support, and lifelong learning are actively reinforced by teamwork, shared ideas, and exuberant creativity.

Capturing TecAce’s 25-year mindset of embracing the waves of change, our constant flow of innovation and engineering DNA now transforms the uncertainties of the AI era into new opportunities, continuing our forward momentum.

Developed MS Windows CE OS & Encarta Encyclopedia

MS WEP Gold Member & Partner of the Year Award

Early Samsung Smartphone Development Partner

Selected as Samsung 1st Tier Software Vendor

Blackjack Smartphone – First Windows Mobile device sold 1M+ units in U.S.

Galaxy S smartphone Android mobile device sold 25M+ units globally

CameraAce Launch – Photo Slideshow Service (2M+ users)

#1 Global Developer for Tizen OS Smart Device Apps

TX (Dallas) Office Opened – Retail Demo Development

Named in Inc. 5000 (Fastest-Growing Private Companies, U.S.)

Recognized as Top IoT Development Company in Washington State

Became Preferred Development Vendor for Samsung Electronics America

Achieved Record-Breaking Revenue (2nd Consecutive Year)

Named Exclusive MSP Partner for Samsung Private Cloud

AI Solutions and Services Set for Release on AWS Market Place

TecAce offers competitive compensation and benefits alongside a company culture that nurtures on-going learning and personal growth. We take pride in our dedication to employee satisfaction.

TecAce offers competitive compensation and benefits alongside a company culture that nurtures on-going learning and personal growth. We take pride in our dedication to employee satisfaction.

A place where everyone feels happiness in just talking to each other

A place where everyone has opportunities to achieve their professional best

A place where everyone celebrates shared achievements

A place where everyone is inspired by working together

A place where everyone’s work brings benefit to the world

825 Watters Creek Blvd, Building M, Suite 250, Allen, TX 75013

TecAce Solutions, Inc. Seoul, South Korea

TecAce Solutions, Inc. Seoul, South Korea

#910, 130 Digital-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul 08589

14F, 373, Gangnam-daero, Seocho-gu, Seoul 06621

14F, 373, Gangnam-daero, Seocho-gu, Seoul 06621

General
AI Supervision
AX Pro
On-device LLM
Uptime Monitoring
Secure CMS

TecAce is a tech consulting and service company headquartered in Bellevue, Washington. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in generative AI, cloud infrastructure, web/app development, and AI evaluation systems. We operate globally with offices  in both the U.S. and Korea. We have full-stack development capabilities in the U.S., enabling us to provide direct development and technical support locally.

We offer a wide range of IT services including AI strategy consulting, custom LLM development, web/app building, AI performance evaluation systems, cloud operations and consulting, mobile and platform development, and IoT solution design.

What are TecAce’s core technical strengths?

What are TecAce’s core technical strengths?

Our core strengths lie in AI transformation services, cloud infrastructure, full-stack web/app development, and advanced AI evaluation systems. We are highly specialized in cutting-edge technologies.

Our key products include an AI LLM application evaluation and supervision system, retail solutions, and cloud operations platforms.

We have successfully collaborated on projects with top global brands such as Samsung Electronics, SK Telecom, Microsoft, Nike, and Uber.
